attributes.action: Restrict HGV's to the inside lane of 2 lane dual carraiageways and motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HGV's that overtake one another on 2 lane dual carraigeways and motorways at little more than half a mile an hour difference causes bunching, frustration and thererfore potential accidents. I urge the PM look at legislation to ban such vehicles from continuing this practice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
